entry.title: Vite report on Thu, 10 Aug 2023 22:00:59
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Meta's PUG brings synthetic and real-world data closer using Unreal Engine
- Corsair’s latest keyboard is its first with magnetic Hall effect switches
- Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 review: a little better is just good enough
- Lego’s new $200 Concorde is a fantastic homage to the supersonic passenger jet
- Check Point buys Perimeter 81 for $490M to enhance its security tools for hybrid and remote workers
- Basys.ai grabs $2.4M for its prior authorization tech powered by Mayo Clinic’s data
- Spearbit raises $7M to improve security audits in crypto through its open marketplace
- ‘Water intelligence’ startup Wint nabs $35M to help companies find and stop leaks
- Web Scraping with Python: A Quick Guide to Scrape Data from Website

Business:
- Foot Locker reportedly refused to stock Yeezys for Adidas' relaunch of Kanye West's shoe brand over fears of a backlash
- Why you shouldn't put all your retirement savings in your 401(k), according to a financial planner
- How Personal Finance Insider chooses, rates, and covers financial products and services
- Brace for stocks and home prices to drop — and the US economy's 'trampoline landing' to end next year, strategist warns
- The economy is very fragile with inflation still hurting poorer Americans, economist Steve Moore says
- Dear SaaStr: How Can You Grow a SaaS Startup Without Spending a Ton on Sales and Marketing?

AI:
- Meta's PUG brings synthetic and real-world data closer using Unreal Engine
- ‘Diablo 4’ May Have Accidentally Or Secretly Buffed Unique Drop Rates
- OKO App Deploys AI To Make Crossing The Street Safer For Blind Pedestrians

Other:
- Bridging the gap: analysis of charged polymers - 2023 - John Wiley
- Ukrainian soldier who lost his leg says he wouldn't volunteer again, voicing a rare but spreading pessimism
- Inflation ticked up in July, pausing a year of slowing price growth
- Electric roads and battery-swapping stations mean you may never need to plug in your EV again
- I drove the $180,000 Lucid Air and saw why it's one of the most impressive Tesla rivals yet
- How to log out of your Facebook account on every device, or on all devices at once from your account settings
- A Ukrainian making gear for the war says his cheap tech wouldn't work against the US or China, but 'we're fighting the Russians'
- Sixto Rodriguez, subject of 'Searching for Sugarman' documentary, dies at 81
- The Emmy Awards are officially delayed because of the writers and actors strikes
- Middle East hotels step it up with high-tech flights and cruises
- Hawaii Wildfires: Death Toll Rises To 36 As Historic Town Is ‘Burnt To The Ground’
